Serialized Form

Package animation

Class animation.Animator extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

liveObjects

java.util.ArrayList<E> liveObjects
Table of live objects currently being managed and displayed.

objectsToAdd

java.util.ArrayList<E> objectsToAdd
Objects that have been added since the last frame. These are added before processing the next frame, so as to avoid modifying the list of all live objects while we are iterating over them.

objectsToDelete

java.util.ArrayList<E> objectsToDelete
Objects that have been deleted since the last frame. The purpose is the same as for objectsToAdd.

frameRate

double frameRate
Interval at which the display is updated, in Hz.

updatesPerFrame

int updatesPerFrame
Number of steps of the physical simulation executed between each frame.

resolution

double resolution
Current screen resolution, in pixels per AU.

done

boolean done
Flag indicating whether the game is over or not.

stroke

java.awt.BasicStroke stroke
Stroke object to control line thickness in drawing.
